metadata.synopsis: Krustine, Mistress of Souls in the Colony Barracks, sends the Skull Lashers on their way to prepare for the march on Baldur's Gate. Played only once.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Barracks using the debugbook- Approach Krustine and the Skull Lashers - don't get too close or interrupt the blessing, but let it complete.- You can also interrupt the blessing and take your way out of it.- After this, they will move on into their behaviours - Krustine will send the Skull Lashers on their way with this AD

0.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
0.text: Gather yourselves - soon, we march to victory.
